name: kathaayoni-academy-website
description: Official website for Kathaayoni Academy - Premier educational institution in Machakos County, Kenya

scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:html: npx html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true --input-dir . --output-dir build --file-ext html
scripts.build:assets: mkdir -p build && cp -r images build/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No images directory' && find . -maxdepth 1 -name '*.ico' -o -name '*.png' -o -name '*.jpg' -o -name '*.jpeg' -o -name '*.gif' -o -name '*.svg' -o -name '*.webp' | xargs -I {} cp {} build/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No additional assets'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.test: npm run lint && echo 'All tests passed!'
scripts.optimize-images: find images/ -name '*.jpg' -o -name '*.jpeg' -o -name '*.png' | while read img; do echo "Checking $img"; done

author: Kathaayoni Academy
